# Interface TextStreamIterator

Streaming interface for text content from graph nodes.

Provides asynchronous streaming for text data with transformation capabilities.

interface TextStreamIterator {  
next: () => Promise<[TextStreamIterationResult](./common_data_types_common.TextStreamIterationResult)>;  
toTextResponse: (  
props: TextStreamIterationToTextResponseInterface,  
) => [TransformationStreamTextToText](/classes/common_stream_transformation_implementations.TransformationStreamTextToText);  
toTTSOutputResponse: (  
props: [TextStreamIterationToTTSOutputResponseInterface](./common_stream_text.TextStreamIterationToTTSOutputResponseInterface),  
) => [TransformationStreamTextToTTS](/classes/common_stream_transformation_implementations.TransformationStreamTextToTTS);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

next toTextResponse toTTSOutputResponse

## Properties

### next

next: () => Promise<[TextStreamIterationResult](./common_data_types_common.TextStreamIterationResult)>

Asynchronously reads the next text chunk from the stream.

  *     * (): Promise<[TextStreamIterationResult](./common_data_types_common.TextStreamIterationResult)>
    * #### Returns Promise<[TextStreamIterationResult](./common_data_types_common.TextStreamIterationResult)>
